body.p:
Dixon Ky Sept 24th. 1865
Gov. T. E. Bramlett
Dear Sir

I have read the petition of D. J. Christian of this County requesting the remission of the fine of $60. imposed upon him for keeping a tipling house. From all I can learn, the facts are correctly set forth; and if Ignorance, poverty and decrepitude should properly appeal to the Clemency of the executive, this is one of the cases
